name: reqres-qa-framework
description: This project is a full-featured **QA test automation framework** targeting the [Reqres API](https://reqres.in) and its UI counterpart built in React ([React-Reqres UI](https://github.com/bramantyobk/react-reqres)).   It is designed to simulate real-world QA engineering workflows for both **API** and **UI testing** using modern tools and practices.
